column1: Little Goat Diner////When we got a table in the dining room
column2: disappointment began to set in.  Our server
column4: was great!  She knew exactly what she was talking about
column5: and answered all of our questions completely!  Unfortunately
column6: where we ran into some strange issues
column7: was with some woman who seemed to be a manager.  She kept coming up to our table and asking if everything was ok
column8: and when we had asked about a full description of our sandwich
column9: she gave us a reply that simply didn't set well with us.  Her demeanor was very "high and mighty" and it felt like every question we asked
column10: we ended up feeling like idiots for asking
column11: because she made us feel that way.  Unfortunately I do not remember her name
column12: but I know that it was definitely unique
column13: and not a common name.  Perhaps
